Title: Un giorno devi andare
Writer: Giorgio Diritti (story), Fredo Valla (story), Giorgio Diritti (screenplay), Fredo Valla (screenplay), Tania Pedroni (screenplay)
Actors: Jasmine Trinca, Anne Alvaro, Sonia Gessner, Pia Engleberth
Plot: Painful family events lead Augusta to leave Italy. On a small boat, immersed in the Amazon Forest grandness, she begins a travel between Indios villages. From the favela to the isolation in the Forest, Augusta will go in search of herself.
